text: DSV Leoben is an Austrian association football club based in Leoben. It was founded in 1928. They play at the Donawitz Stadium. ==Current squad== ==Managers== * Bino Skasa () * Hans Grassl (1949) * Rudi Oblak (1950–1951) * Toni Heubrandner (1952–1953) * Toni Linhart Sr. (1954) * Toni Linhart Sr. (1963–65) * Toni Heubrandner (1965–66) * Lajos Lörinczy (1967–68) * František Korček
